description: Columbine (Aquilegia viridiflora 'Chocolate Soldier') is an amazing plant species due to its unique purple, green and yellow flowers. As if this wasn't enough, the blooms are further complimented by its chocolate-brown foliage, adding a lovely contrast. This hardy perennial provides an abundance of blooms from early summer and into fall. It can be used to great effect in cottage gardens, woodlands, borders and containers, with its height and width of about one and a half feet. Not only do these flowers provide a vibrant show of color, but hummingbirds and butterflies flock to the garden to enjoy its nectar-rich blooms. Truly captivating, Columbine is a must-have for any garden!
